root.speaker: Maude
root.text: She doesn't look up from her book. 'Check-in isn't until two.'

passive_checks.text: She's not reading. Her eyes haven't moved in ten seconds.
This is a power move. She knows you're there.

choices.text: "I'm not here for a room. I'm here for the investigation."
[Place your badge on the counter without a word.]

investigation_branch.speaker: Maude
investigation_branch.text: She turns a page. 'We don't have any crime here, Detective. Just weather.'

badge_branch.speaker: Maude
badge_branch.text: She glances at the metal. Then at you. She closes the book. 'Room 203 key is on the hook. Previous guest checked out early. In a box.'

charm_branch.speaker: Maude
charm_branch.text: She stares at you. Dead eyed. 'It's a romance. I like the parts where they lie to each other.'

death_branch.speaker: Maude
death_branch.text: 'People die everywhere. It's the one thing everyone is good at.'

registry_branch.speaker: Maude
registry_branch.text: 'Computer's down. Solar flares, they say.' She taps the blank monitor. 'You want 203. It's the only one prepared.'

suicide_branch.speaker: Maude
suicide_branch.text: 'Accident. Fell off the pier. Heavy waves.' She doesn't believe it either. You can hear it in the pause.
